short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Answer math questions before visiting social media sites to help wean you off social media.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kwizler is an extension that helps wean you off social media by giving you math questions before you visit distracting sites. Allowing you to be more productive while improving your math skills.
